subject: Everything Was You
text:
A poem dies in me.
I search for you again 
deep in my breast.

The initial spurt of 
the raging thought―
sleeps on the rags.

With scrawny fingers― 
you write a verse of―
moon in night.

The half-moons rise 
in the vacant looks 
like venus flytrap.

Do not pluck the― 
blood roses. My fingers 
were still bleeding.
